document_data.name: Thoughts on the Realms
document_data.author: [[Halidar Thundershield]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Thoughts on the Realms''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Halidar Thundershield]], Lord of [[Yhep]] on the [[Lake of Steam]], and published in the {{YearlinkName|1346}}.{{Cite polyhedron/105/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: More Fabled Treasures of the Land of Turmish|7}}{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
{{quote|''Treasure is a mighty foe; it's killed more adventurers, kings, high priests, and heroes down the ages than just about anything else.''|Excerpt from ''Thoughts on the Realms''}}
document_data.History: A copy was kept in the great fortress-library of [[Candlekeep]] around [[1372 DR]].
